name: Tofu's Journey Across the Universe
description:
GAME SUMMARY:

Tofu awakens to his surprise to be found in another universe from his own. With some help along the way, Tofu adventures out through the different dimensions in order to return to his hometown, Tofu-ville. Help bring Tofu back as you travel along and solve the various obstacles and challenges up ahead.

CREDITS
